login.title: Developer Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to your developer account to manage your extensions

errors.failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

register.title: Create Developer Account
register.subtitle: Start publishing extensions on the haex marketplace

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.

checkEmail.title: Check Your Email
checkEmail.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address.
checkEmail.instructions: Click the link in the email to verify your developer account. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.

loading.title: Verifying...
loading.description: Please wait while we verify your email address.

success.title: Email Verified!
success.description: Your developer account has been verified. Redirecting to dashboard...

error.title: Verification Failed
error.description: We couldn't verify your email. The link may have expired.
